## Problem

You are performing an *in vitro* transcription assay, and you measure
the number of RNA molecules produced in multiple experiments, each with
different recording time intervals.

You record the following results:

| time interval (min) | number of RNA molecules |
|:-------------------:|:-----------------------:|
|         1           |            6            |
|         1           |            8            |
|         1           |            2            |
|         2           |           11            |
|         2           |           13            |
|         2           |           14            |
|         3           |           14            |
|         3           |           17            |
|         3           |           13            |

What is the transcription rate in
terms of number of RNA molecules transcribed per minute?


## Tasks

1. Implement a quantification model in [Stan][1] to estimate
   the posterior distribution of the transcription rate.

2. Derive the posterior distribution of the transcription rate.


[1]: https://mc-stan.org/
